ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Frequency of any type of self-injury in the last 3 months
Notes: 0=never; 1=<5x; 2=5-10x; 3=1-2x per month; 4=1-2x per week; 5=once a day

ElementDescription: Frequency of cutting/carving skin in the last 3 months
Notes: 0=never; 1=<5x; 2=5-10x; 3=1-2x per month; 4=1-2x per week; 5=once a day

ElementDescription: Frequency of hitting self in the last 3 months
Notes: 0=never; 1=<5x; 2=5-10x; 3=1-2x per month; 4=1-2x per week; 5=once a day

ElementDescription: Frequency of pulling hair in the last 3 months
Notes: 0=never; 1=<5x; 2=5-10x; 3=1-2x per month; 4=1-2x per week; 5=once a day

ElementDescription: Frequency of burning skin in the last 3 months
Notes: 0=never; 1=<5x; 2=5-10x; 3=1-2x per month; 4=1-2x per week; 5=once a day

ElementDescription: Describe any other type of self-injury you engage in
Mean of NSSI score
Frequency score
Frequency of burning skin in the past year
Notes: 0=never; 1=<5x; 2=5-10x; 3=1-2x per month; 4=1-2x per week; 5=once a day; 999=Prefer not to answer/missing

ElementDescription: Respondent
Which method/s have you used to hurt yourself? Picking at wound or other areas to draw blood
Which method/s have you used to hurt yourself? Pulling out own hair
Which method/s have you used to hurt yourself? Burning self
Which method/s have you used to hurt yourself? Biting self
Which method/s have you used to hurt yourself? Swallowing dangerous substances
How many times have you engaged in NSSI in your lifetime?
Notes: 0=Once; 1=A few times; 2=5 to 10 times; 3=10 to 20 times; 4=20 to 50 times; 5=50 to 100 times; 6=More than 100 times

ElementDescription: Over the past 12 months, how often have you engaged in NSSI?
Notes: 0=Never; 1=Once; 2=A few times; 3=Once a month; 4=Once a week; 5=Few times per week; 6=Every day

ElementDescription: How many times have you engaged in NSSI in the past month?
Do you want to stop?
How confident are you that you can resist harming yourself on purpose, not as a way to end your life (NSSI)?
How much did you engage in NSSI in order to: Get rid of bad feelings
How much did you engage in NSSI in order to: Stop feeling numb/empty
How much did you engage in NSSI in order to: Communicate, get attention, or revenge
How much did you engage in NSSI in order to: Stop suicidal thoughts or impulses
Have you ever harmed yourself or hurt your body on purpose, such as cutting/burning your skin, or hitting yourself, without the intention to die (NSSI)?
If yes, how old were you the first time you did this?
If yes, how long ago was the last time you did this?
Which method/s have you used to hurt yourself? Cutting/carving skin
Which method/s have you used to hurt yourself? Scraping/scratching skin to point of drawing blood
Which method/s have you used to hurt yourself? Inserting objects under skin or nails
Which method/s have you used to hurt yourself? Hitting/punching self
How much did you engage in NSSI in order to: Get out of doing something or to get away from others?
Now thinking of things you may have done to yourself on purpose. Have you ever: Cut or carved your skin?
Now thinking of things you may have done to yourself on purpose. Have you ever: Hit yourself?
Now thinking of things you may have done to yourself on purpose. Have you ever: Pulled your hair?
Now thinking of things you may have done to yourself on purpose. Have you ever: Burned your skin?
Now thinking of things you may have done to yourself on purpose. Have you ever: Done some other type of self-injury?
Have you talked to someone for advice or guidance (like a teacher, counselor, therapist, clergy, or a mentor) about these feelings you have had?
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes, in the past year; 2=Yes, more than 1 year ago; 999=Prefer not to answer/missing

ElementDescription: Have you ever done something to purposely hurt yourself without wanting to die, such as cutting, scraping, or burning yourself on purpose?
In the past 6 months have you done something to purposely hurt yourself without wanting to die, such as cutting, scraping, or burning yourself on purpose?
In the past 12 months, have you harmed or hurt your body on purpose, such as cutting or burning your skin, or hitting yourself, without wanting to die?
Notes: 0= 0 time; 1= 1-2 times; 2= 3-4 times; 3= 5 or more times
